name: GPTPRReviewer
description: This task uses OpenAI API to review and leave comments on Pull Requests
author: Aries Lai

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: Api key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Api key of OpenAi or Azure OpenAI.

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: OpenAI model
inputs.helpMarkDown: The OpenAI model to use. not used if you use Azure OpenAI. if no model is selected, the GPT 3.5 Turbo model is used.

inputs.name: aoi_endpoint
inputs.label: Azure OpenApi Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure OpenApi Endpoint, leave empty to use default endpoint. (optional)

inputs.name: support_self_signed_certificate
inputs.label: Support self-signed certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to support self-signed certificate.

inputs.name: ai_instructions
inputs.label: AI Instruction Prompt
inputs.defaultValue:
Act as a code reviewer of a Pull Request, providing feedback on possible bugs and clean code issues.
You are provided with the Pull Request changes in a patch format.
Each patch entry has the commit message in the Subject line followed by the code changes (diffs) in a unidiff format.

As a code reviewer, your task is:
- Review only added, edited or deleted lines.
- If there's no bugs and the changes are correct, write only 'No feedback.'
- If there's bug or incorrect code changes, don't write 'No feedback.'
inputs.helpMarkDown: Changing this from the default value may cause issues with the review
